cgcloud__Batch_Last_Successful_Run__c.name: cgcloud__Batch_Last_Successful_Run__c
cgcloud__Batch_Last_Successful_Run__c.description: Keeps track of the last successful runs.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Last_Run_Mode__c.description: The mode for which the batch process ran.

cgcloud__Last_Successful_Run__c.description: The time of the last successful run of the batch process.

cgcloud__Process_Id__c.description: The process reference ID of the batch.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: The sales org on which the batch process ran.

cgcloud__Unique_Id__c.description: The unique concatenation of process and sales org.
